评论详情: The Alyweatry Women Y2K Bikinis Set delivers on its promise of trendy coquette aesthetics, featuring charming bows and a flattering high-cut design. The halter tie-up top is stylish and adjustable, making it great for accentuating your neckline.  However, buyers should note that the sizing runs extremely small—about two sizes smaller than expected. This can make finding the right fit challenging, especially for those with fuller figures. While the elastic waist on the bottoms is forgiving, the overall fit may feel restrictive. For best results, consider sizing up significantly or exploring similar styles with more accurate sizing.
I order this medium size, it fit fine, but I wished I ordered it large size. Love the colors and the style. Quality of the swimsuit is perfect

类型: Size: SmallColor: Lace Trim Navy Blue
评论详情: I think this bikini is really good for a dupe, I read the reviews and was very skeptical but seriously the only difference is the color which isn’t even bad, I’m a 24 waist and ordered a Small so I do feel like the bottoms are a little on the modest side if you’re looking for something cheekier, but over all I love the fit of it so much!!! 类型: Size: SmallColor: Lace Trim Navy Blue
评论详情: The bikini is very cute, I love the little ruffles and ribbons. The bottoms fit nicely but the top looks a little off. Makes my A cup boobies look even tinier. The padding can be removed. The color is royal blue. The material feels like any other swimsuit. Overall not a bad set!

评论概述: Cheap, ill fitting, waste of money
评论详情: Extremely poor quality, sizing is awful and not worth your time/money! Do not recommend! I'm 4'11, 100lbs and bought a size medium in two separate suits and neither fit. Both are extremely small, the cut on the bottoms makes the material bunch up and it's stitched crooked. Cannot wear.

评论概述: I bought both the original motel and this one
类型: Size: SmallColor: Lace Trim Navy Blue
评论详情: The original one for motel rocks costs 4x more than this one from Amazon. The biggest aesthetic difference is the color.  The Amazon is a lighter shade of navy than the motel one.  Which one would I buy if they were both the same price?  The Amazon hands down.  The motel has weirdly long straps that aren’t adjustable, freakishly tiny cups even with my smaller boobs, no bra pads, and a cheap plastic clasp.  I was upset by how cheap the motel rocks one was when I got it.  I’ve bought better quality with Shein. The Amazon one has a metal clasp, adjustable straps and bra pads.  The bottom covers a little more for the Amazon one, but that doesn’t bother me.
